spec_data.Name: perl-Dist-Zilla-Plugin-CopyFilesFromRelease
spec_data.Description:
This Dist::Zilla plugin will automatically copy the files that you specify in
dist.ini from the build directory into the distribution directory. This is so
you can commit them to version control.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:12:26 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Copy files from a release for SCM inclusion
